Posts.EditableText: Welcome Balerod! I'm Elex, and only been here, what is it 2... 3... years now. The quest system is great in my opinion, very flexible. And yes, the GUI is prolly the best out there, though when you get the the upper cut of quest's powers it becomes easier to code by hand; window after window can become slow and dull. Anyway if you need any help, you ask. I know a lot about ASL, both GUI and hand coding, though currently I prefer hand-coding. Tron also knows a lot, only [i:5v0az0oe]slightly[/i:5v0az0oe] more than me . He's very good and helps me sometimes, as I can be a bit of a noob still. I hope you have fun here, and find quest to be awesome!
